channel.title: TLS 1.3 on Thom Wiggers
channel.description: Recent content in TLS 1.3 on Thom Wiggers

item.title: Using (post-quantum) KEMs in TLS 1.3
item.description: The new TLS 1.3 standard [1] does not yet provide any support for post-quantum algorithms. In this blog post we’ll be talking about how we could negotiate a post-quantum key exchange using a (post-quantum) Key Encapsulation Mechanism (KEM). In the NIST Standardisation effort [2], many KEMs are currently under consideration.
